[Page Title: The Perch - Get Carried Away]

Skip to content 
The Perch

Where Getting Carried Away is Good Thing!

Let Us Be Your New Hangout

Socialize with your friends and family for any occasion. Enjoy after-school snacks for kids, a glass of wine from our handpicked selection, or a refreshing cocktail to get your night started. Make sure to bring an appetite…the menu has the perfect assortment of dips, salads & sammies, seafood choices, and more! There’s something for everyone on The Perch, so come on by!
Check Out Our All Day Menu Calling all college football fans Fresh hand squeezed Just picked your child up from school? Need a quick lunch? Need some pregaming chow? Need to pull together dinner? 
The Perch Spring/Summer Hours

11:00 AM – 6:00 PM
Tues-Wed: 
11:00 AM – 8:00 PM
Thurs-Sat: 
Kitchen Hours

Kitchen closed on Mondays, Grab n' Go available only

From Pawley The Pelican:

There’s room for everyone on The Perch! Catch your game live on the TV’s or enjoy music and conversation with friends and family. Make yourself comfortable in the patio area while you eat, drink, and take it easy!

Join us on The Polar Perch for festive cocktails, dine under twinkling lights, and delight in holiday cheer!

Starting Nov. 30th Until Dec. 21st

Tues – Wed 11am – 6pm (kitchen closes at 5)Thursday – Saturday 11am – 9pm (kitchen closes at 8)

[Page Title: Pawleys Island - Get Carried Away]

Skip to content 
Pawleys Island

Our Slice of Paradise

Whether you’re just passing through for a grab n’ go bite, feeding your family and friends in your beach house for the week, or a local needing a homecooked dinner without the hassle, Get Carried Away Pawleys Island offers southern hospitality every step of the way. Don’t forget to grab a bottle of wine and a hostess gift on your way out!
Holiday Menu Specials 
Pawleys Island Weekly Dinner Specials

Specials 1/12 -

1/16

*Only Available in our Pawleys Island Location*
Chicken Parmesan over spaghetti and a side salad. Monday: Salisbury steak, rice and gravy, Lima beans and cornbread. Tuesday: Shrimp and Grits, homemade cheese biscuit and side of fruit. Wednesday: Baked Ziti, garlic bread and dessert sampling. Thursday: Check back next week 
Chicken Parmesan over spaghetti and a side salad.
Monday: 
Salisbury steak, rice and gravy, Lima beans and cornbread.
Tuesday: 
Shrimp and Grits, homemade cheese biscuit and side of fruit.
Wednesday: 
Baked Ziti, garlic bread and dessert sampling.
Thursday: 
Low Country Boil (Shrimp, Sausage, Corn, Potatoes, Onion, Lemon, Seasonings, and Cocktail Sauce) $17
Monday–Saturday: 
Check back next week!

No specials until January 5th, 2026!

Additional Info

*Specials are sold by the portion and quantities are limited.

*Daily Specials are ready for pick up between 4:30 & 5:30 p.m. Monday through Thursday.
For more info or to reserve a meal: Call: +1 (843) 314-3493 
Daily Hot Perlo lunch

Lunch will be served hot and ready until 2pm Monday – Saturday

$14.00 per plate plus tax

Call ahead or walk in to order

Plate Includes:

– Hot Perlo

– A side of one of our daily veggies

– French bread

– Dessert sampling
Call: +1 (843) 314-3493 
Pawleys Island Gifting & Entertaining

While you’re picking up your favorite casserole and bottle of wine, check out the selection of hostess gifts, birthday party essentials, and tablescaping decor in our perfectly arrogantly shabby market!
Browse Gifts 
We'd love to hear from you!

For any food orders, please give us a call!
10126 Ocean Highway, Pawleys Island, SC 29585 +1 (843) 314-3493 Mon–Sat: 9AM–6PMSun: Closed

[Page Title: Mount Pleasant - Get Carried Away]

Skip to content 
Mount Pleasant

Keepin' it Coastal

Located between Shem Creek and Sullivan’s Island, Get Carried Away Mount Pleasant has everything to complete your beach or boat day. If you need a break from the South Carolina heat, come join us on our family and dog friendly patio, The Perch, for cocktails, sandwiches, and more! Be sure to browse around the market for items to get your party started!
Holiday Menu The Perch Private Event 
Welcome to Our Bar and Café!

The Perch

Surround yourself with sunshine, flowers, and good company on our outdoor patio! Enjoy craft cocktails and share a meal with your family and friends… don’t forget to bring your pup along, too!
Check Out The Perch 
Mount Pleasant Gifting & Entertaining

From the moment you walk into these doors, you will feel an immediate sense of true southern hospitality. Our market has everything you need for hosting your dream dinner party, completing the ultimate beach and boat day, and thoughtfully gifting the special people in your life!
Browse Gifts 
We'd love to hear from you!

For any food orders, please give us a call!
644 Coleman Boulevard, Mount Pleasant, SC 29464 +1 (843) 483-0170 Mon–Wed: 11AM–6PM Thurs–Sat: 11AM–8PM Sunday: Closed Southern Market Monday: Closed (Grab n' Go only)Tues–Wed: 11AM–6PMThurs-Sat: 11AM–8PMSunday: Closed The Perch Café

[Page Title: Beer + Wine - Get Carried Away]

Skip to content Back to shop 
Beer + Wine

Come check out our selection of 100+ wines and dozens of your local favorite craft beers!

Adami Garbèl Brut Prosecco

An amazing representation of what a classic Italian prosecco is supposed to be

Belle Glos

Recognize this red wax? It’s the signature of award winning Pinot Noir’s from California.

Edmund Oast

Based in Charleston, SC: Edmund’s Oast is a local favorite and allows you to explore the beer flavor universe.

Freehouse

Represents the best of beer produced organically and sustainably.

Moet Chandon

Distinguished by its bright fruitiness, its seductive palate and its elegant maturity.

Munkle

Munkle brings traditional Belgian and Old World style beer to the Charleston, SC area.

Noah River

A medium bodied Pinot Noir with a floral nose made by Charleston local, Jamey Whetstone.

Scarpetta

Created as an homage to the Italian lifestyle.

Westbrook

Located in Mt. Pleasant, Westbrook Brewing puts a creative, high-turnover spin on production brewing

Frequently Ask Questions
Can I get items shipped to my house? Although we are not shipping at this time, we are working on getting it started as soon as possible. We will be posting shipping updates on our social media platforms and on our website…stay tuned! Can I purchase an e-gift card? 
We do not offer e-giftcards at this time, but we are happy to ship a physical gift card to you in the mail if you call either of our locations for assistance. We can also email you a gift card number to save and use similarly to a promo code.
I picked up a frozen casserole but want to eat it tonight. How do I get it ready in time? 
If you pick up a frozen casserole and are looking to eat it the same day/night, we recommend letting your casserole sit in a pan of warm to defrost quicker. Once your casserole has finished thawing, follow the instructions on the label and enjoy!
How long will the dips, pies, and non-frozen items last? 
All of our refrigerated have a shelf life of one week.
Can I freeze any items I buy? 
If you purchase any refrigerated dip, savory/sweet pie, or side that you decide not to eat immediately, you can freeze it and save it for another time!
*EXCEPT TOMATO PIE* Do you sell gift cards? 
We offer e-giftcards that can be sent to any of your family members and friends via text or email! You can purchase e-giftcards by calling  or visiting the .
either of your locations Online Ordering Page
